docs.lead_paragraph: All Americans would have access to “essential health care benefits” and the government would create a new public insurance program under Senator Edward M. Kennedy’s plan.

headline.main: Sweeping Health Plan Is Drafted by Kennedy
headline.print_headline: Sweeping Health Plan Is Drafted by Kennedy

docs.snippet: All Americans would have access to “essential health care benefits” and the government would create a new public insurance program under Senator Edward M. Kennedy’s plan.
